name: CurrentBackyard
0:
”Alexa, open Current Backyard and tell me my grill temperature.”
”Alexa, load Current Backyard and turn my grill off.”
”Alexa, load Current Backyard and tell me my probe temperatures.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: current backyard
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to CURRENT. We turn your backyard into an oasis of flavor and fun with family and friends. 

Our skill is the smart companion to your outdoor cooking experience. Entertain while having wireless control at your fingertips with temperature monitoring for foolproof results, every time.  
 
Featuring: 
•       Manual Mode: Set your own temps and timers to keep a handle on your cook, monitor and adjust as you go. 
 
Get ready to connect to a feeling of culinary confidence, a world of elevated taste and an electrifying smart home system that seamlessly brings together the indoors and outdoors and, most importantly, family and friends. 
  
Reimagine outdoor living here, at Current Backyard.
